alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Sevier Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sevier County through 530 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Monroe, or 10 miles south of Richfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Richfield, Monroe, Annabella, Sevier, Elsinore, Glenwood and Joseph. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 24 and 39. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 19 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
